plot: Michael Savona, Canadian classical guitarist serenades this dark story of a knight meeting his demise. This human story of a being who cannot let go speaks to all our nightmares, dreams and constant reminders of our mortality.
title: La Catedral
plot_es: Michael Savona, Canadian classical guitarist serenades this dark story of a knight meeting his demise. This human story of a being who cannot let go speaks to all our nightmares, dreams and constant reminders of our mortality.
